```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
library(ggthemes)
library(rio)
```

data
```{r}
link = "https://github.com/Charting-Chumps/Assignment-1/raw/main/LifeExpect_birth.xlsx"
cia = import(link)
```

chart
```{r}
cia80 = cia[cia$value>80,]
region80tab = as.data.frame(table(cia80$region))
names(region80tab) = c("Region", "Count")

base = ggplot(data = region80tab, aes(x = Region, y = Count))
plot1 = base + geom_bar(fill = "black",
                      stat = 'identity') + theme_fivethirtyeight()
plot1
```
